showScoreExcerpt:
A "Jaws" fan will get the most out of this play. It might be disappointing that "The Shark is Broken" is a good, not great, play. Through the multitudes of its thoughts, you'll wonder if Shaw and Nixon considered that this 95-minute, intermission-free play could afford to be more sprawling. Despite these kinks, each episode isn't wasted time with these men.
